nodes.text: Sparky was Jaina Solo's red and white[source?] R5-series astromech droid during her early tenure with Rogue Squadron in the war with the Yuuzhan Vong. Sparky was destroyed a year into the conflict when Jaina strayed too close to an exploding New Republic ship in her T-65XJ X-wing starfighter at the Battle of Kalarba. Jaina was distraught at the loss of her droid, and eventually replaced the astromech with R2-B3, a droid nicknamed "Cappie" after her fallen wingman Anni Capstan.
Sparky first appeared in the 1999 novel The New Jedi Order: Dark Tide I: Onslaught, the second book in the series Star Wars: The New Jedi Order and the first installment of the Dark Tide Duology.

Although described as an R5 unit in Onslaught, The New Jedi Order: Balance Point, and The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, in The New Jedi Order: Dark Tide II: Ruin, Sparky is mistakenly described as an R2-series astromech droid.
